title: Brazil maintains high wage bill in January, a good omen for 2024 GDP
description:
Brazil’s unemployment rate rose slightly to 7.6 percent in the rolling quarter through January, about 0.2 percentage points below market expectations.  The increase was expected, as the end of temporary Christmas jobs usually affects the labor market at the start of the new year. This time, the impact was milder than expected, which analysts say […]

The post Brazil maintains high wage bill in January, a good omen for 2024 GDP appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: A coup-friendly leader
description:
Jair Bolsonaro’s big mouth is perhaps his worst enemy.  During this period, Mr. Bolsonaro became known as a president that harbored putschist desires. Aside from the fact that he was an apologist for Brazil’s military dictatorship (and others), the ex-head of state was always delivering inflammatory speeches to his supporters that posed a threat to […]

The post A coup-friendly leader  appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: Bolsonaro remarks “seemed” like a confession: Supreme Court justice
description:
Supreme Court Justice Gilmar Mendes said in an interview on Wednesday that remarks made by former far-right President Jair Bolsonaro during a recent rally “seemed” like a confession of a planned coup attempt. Under the ongoing Federal Police investigation, he said, Mr. Bolsonaro could be considered a direct perpetrator of the crime, as opposed to […]

The post Bolsonaro remarks “seemed” like a confession: Supreme Court justice appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
